articles.description: Suki Waterhouse was one of the first people to arrive at the Dior Fall-Winter 2021-2022 fashion collection in Paris on Monday.
articles.content:
Suki Waterhouse was one of the first people to arrive at the Dior Fall-Winter 2021-2022 fashion collection in Paris on Monday. 
The actress, 29, looked incredible wearing a black leather bondage bra… [+2689 chars]
